Text: amazing blu ray... has great color & sharpness.. crispy picture..
Boring old shitty film. I dont get why it got rated on IMDB so high???

A damn fine (albeit huge) MySilu release. Proper bitrate. Film grain intact. Absolutely perfect 5.1 DTS (1.5 Mbps) audio. Thanks aoloffline, seeders.
